m_szDocTitle: Fully Electric Version Of Volvo XC90 SUV In The Works | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Fully Electric Version Of Volvo XC90 SUV In The Works May 14th, 2014 by James Ayre   A fully electric version of Volvo’s soon-to-be-released SUV — the XC90 — is already in the works, according to recent reports. Volvo XC90 While the conventional version of the 2014 XC90 is still yet to make it to market, there’s already a whole range of other versions in the pipeline — including a plug-in hybrid version that will launch sometime relatively soon after the regular version, and a fully electric version that will likely hit the market sometime in 2016 or 2017.
